div.ui:msg: Jennifer Ruth Hosek (homepage) is an Associate Professor in the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures at Queens's University, Canada. Mostly I work on 20th and 21st century transnational German culture, but needed to start LinguaeLive because I believe that it's a great opportunity for learners everywhere.

ui:msg.description: Mayu Takasaki, Marjorie Willey, Hannah Cowell, Elisabeth Scholz, Wayne Cowell, Xuelin Bai, Michael Pickles, Patrice Fuchsa, Robynn Glockling, Lisa Quinn

ui:msg.description: We gratefully acknowledge support from Queen's University and the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council of Canada, as well our student peer learners around the world.
